TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PaintEventArgs extends System.EventArgs implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class PaintEventArgs Inherits EventArgs Implements IDisposable
public ref class PaintEventArgs : EventArgs, IDisposable

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重繪控制項時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when a control is redrawn. A指定用於繪製控制項和要繪製。A specifies the to use to paint the control and the in which to paint. 事件模型的相關資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範處理事件並使用類別在表單上繪製的矩形。The following example demonstrates handling the event and using the class to draw rectangles on the form. 和來決定矩形的大小不會處理事件。The and events are handled to determine the size of the rectangle. 此範例也示範要使其失效的矩形中，導致必須重新繪製區域的方法。The example also demonstrates the method to invalidate the area of the rectangle, causing it to be redrawn. [!code-cpp[Demontrates Form Paint Event#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Demontrates Form Paint Event/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Demontrates Form Paint Event#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Demontrates Form Paint Event/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Demontrates Form Paint Event#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Demontrates Form Paint Event/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified graphics and clipping rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由`graphics`處置參數時處置。The identified by the `graphics` parameter is disposed when the is disposed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會在上繪製線條和文字控制項。The following code examples draws lines and text on a control. [!code-cpp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#42)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#42)]

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在記憶體回收開始前，允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並執行其他清除作業。

span.span: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
